page.title: 10New Uses for Old Buildings
page.content: {1HOUSES}.Large houses no longer have one family with many children and servants in them. Some are now used for:- BUSINESSES-S.I.R.A.Defence Research,Engineering Consultants, Restaurants, Hotels(Hackwood,Bickley Manor). Ravensfell House,Bromley High Street, is used by Russell and Bromley Shoe Shop. EDUCATION-Sundridge Park Management Centre and schools(Babington House, Bickley Parva, Bullers Wood, Clarks, Stratford House). OTHER USES- Old Peoples' Homes, Bromley Civic Centre, Golf Clubhouse(Camden Place of 1609 is the oldest house on this page). {COACH HOUSES}.Most are converted into houses, but one is a dance school, another at Stratford House forms cloakrooms and a laboratory. {CHURCH}.Tylney Road Methodist Church is now flats. {SCHOOL}.A Bridge Club has bought one at Masons Hill.
